name: GENIEBOOK
description: Geniebook was founded in 2017 by experienced educators, tech wizards, and designers who have spent over 10 years teaching and pioneering programs to help students improve. We firmly believe that education is personal, and that students should have access to a personalised world-class education that brings together the best of technology and learning pedagogies, to help them grow into confident learners and contributors to society.
features: Find strengths and weaknesses of students with the help of AI
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Geniebook is a suite of online learning tools powered by AI to help students learn smarter and do better.
ShortDescription: Geniebook is a powerful suite of online learning products including AI-personalised worksheets (GenieSmart), live online classes (GenieClass), and real-time teacher chats (GenieAsk) to help primary and secondary school students learn smarter and do better.
enhanced_description: Geniebook, founded in 2017 by experienced educators, tech experts, and designers, offers a powerful suite of AI-powered online learning tools and products. It is specifically designed to help primary and secondary school students learn smarter and improve, aiming to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency. The platform provides personalized coaching, including AI-personalised worksheets (GenieSmart), live online classes (GenieClass), and real-time teacher chats (GenieAsk). Geniebook utilizes AI to find and address students' strengths and weaknesses, delivering a personalized, world-class education that blends technology with effective learning pedagogies to foster confident learners and contributors to society.
key_use_cases: AI-powered identification of student strengths and weaknesses
Delivery of AI-personalised worksheets for targeted practice
Facilitation of live online classes for structured learning
Provision of real-time teacher support through chat
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for students
competitive_advantages: Integrated suite of AI-powered learning tools (worksheets, classes, chats)
Personalized learning experience driven by AI
Combination of technology with proven learning pedagogies
